## Description {#details}

A utility class to expose symbols found via dlsym to the JIT.

If an instance of this class is attached to a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> as a fallback definition generator, then any symbol found in the given <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary">DynamicLibrary</a> that passes the &#39;Allow&#39; predicate will be added to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a>.

Definition at line 216 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executionutils-h">ExecutionUtils.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### DynamicLibrarySearchGenerator() {#a4c2c1b5c591838d836baac42520e8a4f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::orc::DynamicLibrarySearchGenerator::DynamicLibrarySearchGenerator (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary">sys::DynamicLibrary</a> Dylib, char GlobalPrefix, <a href="#a232bd355bb8de67b8f81c0d8f266fea7">SymbolPredicate</a> Allow=<a href="#a232bd355bb8de67b8f81c0d8f266fea7">SymbolPredicate</a>(), <a href="#a305a6ca4a80b77aa5991a3e8fa4a242b">AddAbsoluteSymbolsFn</a> AddAbsoluteSymbols=nullptr)</>}>
Create a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/dynamiclibrarysearchgenerator">DynamicLibrarySearchGenerator</a> that searches for symbols in the given <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary">sys::DynamicLibrary</a>.

If the Allow predicate is given then only symbols matching the predicate will be searched for. If the predicate is not given then all symbols will be searched for.

If <code>AddAbsoluteSymbols</code> is provided, it is used to add the symbols to the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a></code>; otherwise it uses JD.define(absoluteSymbols(...)).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executionutils-h/#l00230">230</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executionutils-h">ExecutionUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/executionutils-cpp/#l00224">224</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/executionutils-cpp">ExecutionUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### tryToGenerate() {#a6f48283edeff2b9dfa266043c7229d2f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::orc::DynamicLibrarySearchGenerator::tryToGenerate (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lookupstate">LookupState</a> &amp; LS, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#ac17672ae6b70c781cc77713e88d698eb">LookupKind</a> K, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> &amp; JD, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a7cb1d8cb0ab2329f032d69d79498c81d">JITDylibLookupFlags</a> JDLookupFlags, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/symbollookupset">SymbolLookupSet</a> &amp; LookupSet)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
DefinitionGenerators should override this method to insert new definitions into the parent <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a>.

K specifies the kind of this lookup. JD specifies the target <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> being searched, and JDLookupFlags specifies whether the search should match against hidden symbols. Finally, Symbols describes the set of unresolved symbols and their associated lookup flags.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executionutils-h/#l00253">253</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executionutils-h">ExecutionUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/executionutils-cpp/#l00244">244</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/executionutils-cpp">ExecutionUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### Load() {#a6a9c2b5ee04aac9abc6857434c7d71b4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; DynamicLibrarySearchGenerator &gt; &gt; llvm::orc::DynamicLibrarySearchGenerator::Load (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; FileName, char GlobalPrefix, <a href="#a232bd355bb8de67b8f81c0d8f266fea7">SymbolPredicate</a> Allow=<a href="#a232bd355bb8de67b8f81c0d8f266fea7">SymbolPredicate</a>(), <a href="#a305a6ca4a80b77aa5991a3e8fa4a242b">AddAbsoluteSymbolsFn</a> AddAbsoluteSymbols=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Permanently loads the library at the given path and, on success, returns a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/dynamiclibrarysearchgenerator">DynamicLibrarySearchGenerator</a> that will search it for symbol definitions in the library.

On failure returns the reason the library failed to load.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executionutils-h/#l00239">239</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/executionutils-h">ExecutionUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/executionutils-cpp/#l00232">232</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/executionutils-cpp">ExecutionUtils.cpp</a>.
